meanings.definition: An ancient alphabet used in Ireland.
meanings.sent1: The ogam was an important way to write in ancient Ireland.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the ogam in my history class.
meanings.sent3: The ogam seemed like a secret code to the curious students.
meanings.sent4: The ogam carved on the stone seemed to whisper ancient tales.
meanings.sent5: The intricate ogam characters were etched into the ancient monument.

meanings.sent1: The ogam was a unique way to write messages.
meanings.sent2: The ogam symbols were fascinating to study.
meanings.sent3: The ogam writing system looked like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: The ogam script danced across the page like a graceful dancer.
meanings.sent5: The ogam inscriptions were like a map leading to hidden treasures.

meanings.sent1: The ogam was used to send messages across long distances.
meanings.sent2: People used the ogam to communicate important information.
meanings.sent3: The ogam was like a magical language that connected people.
meanings.sent4: The ogam carried whispers of love and friendship through time.
meanings.sent5: The ogam symbols spoke louder than words in times of need.
